channel.title: Publish :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Publish an integration to the OIN Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: - Reasons for the name publish: - Aligned with the action/task based focus of the site - The ultimate goal of this section is to “Publish” on the OIN - Some user research evidence Existing doc needs to be updated to reflect new changes to sub groups Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer

item.title: Review the OIN restrictions
item.description: Review the OIN restrictions Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: The “OIN Limitations” section from the pre-requisites page. This is being pulled out separately as it is linked to in many other pages compares to the pre-reqs in general and it needs to be easier to find in the navigation as a result. Changes to be made: Update with any UL or SCIM Entitlements limitations if there are any

item.title: Review the OIN submission requirements
item.description: Review the OIN submission requirements Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Basically the existing OIN pre-reqs page minue the OIN limitations page which is being split out into its own page - “OIN Restrictions” Changes to be made: Update with any UL or SCIm Entitlements pre-reqs if there are any Links to original docs: - OIN submission requirements: https://developer.

item.title: Submit your integration to OIN
item.description: Submitting a new app integration to the OIN Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Structure type: Navigation Content type: Autogenerated Index An autogenerated index is an automatically generated list of links to topics immediately beneath it based purely on the site’s structure, or with some level of filtering. A blind list of summaries and links to child docs.

item.title: Update your integration
item.description: Releasing new versions of your app Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Based on the User research we need to determine what the content should be for this section. Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Why is this here?: At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: Missing information from the app providers on their new versions SP Software version info Structure type: Navigation

item.title: Find help for OIN problems
item.description: Find help for OIN problems Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: The goal of this page is to give links to OIN related education courses, OIN support communites, sites where they need to talk to sales, etc. Why is this here?: - Internal workshop: When asked “What prevents developers from being successful on the OIN”, respondents answered: - How to ask for and receive help from OKta - Links to Okta Education classes
